title: Upgrading to 4a from OLD LG reflex, is there a way to import my old phone directory into the new 4a?
content: I'd like to import my LG contacts into the 4a. When I turn the 4a on the first time, it downloaded all the contacts from my gmail account, but that doesn't have the phone numbers for the people I converse with.  PLEASE don't tell me I have to type all those numbers in manually.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4a
